snippet.title: Among the Innocent launch trailer
snippet.description: The first game in the Stricken series, Among the Innocent sees players exploring a remote, desolate farmstead in the Eastern Free State, South Africa, and uncovering its dark secrets. Among the Innocent combines classic point-and-click with modern first-person exploration, and offers a mature experience for players who long for intrigue.
